title: (x) Kunsthalle Tirol - ITC Officina Display {Yves}
content:
![Similar to DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052105im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25456.jpg)   
   
Similar to DIN..maybe just the "I" has serifs added?
author: apocalypso

comments.content: I can't tell. They don't show the whole character set. It kind of looks like Officina, but the ends of some of the strokes are flat instead of angled.
